title: To Live Is To Die - Metallica Tribute Short Movie
description:
THERE IS NO VIRUS IN THE FILE

My name is Rashid. I am a 4th year medical student from Malaysia. I have no previous experience 
in film making, script writing, screenplay writing, directing, editing or producing a film.
This is my first attempt, and i think it&#039;s pretty good for a beginner. If you are a Tarantino
fan, you will find alot of familiar scenes.
This is a definite tribute movie for Metallica.

Lars, please dont sue me.

I would love to hear your comments. Please e-mail me at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="1062712578217450787f647d71797c3e737f7d3e">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

This video is in DIVX format. The resolution is 608x336. Size is only 320 mb.
And the movie is in English.
